articles.author: Carly Page
articles.title: Apple fixes bug that undermined iOS privacy feature for years - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple has released a fix for a years-old vulnerability in iOS that rendered one of its privacy-enhancing features near useless since launch.
articles.content:
Apple has fixed a years-old vulnerability in its iPhone and iPad software that undermined a privacy feature since it first debuted.
Back in 2020, Apple announced a new feature in iOS 14 that would p… [+2565 chars]
